markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tanglefoot Extruder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1985)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 65 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This portable nozzle-and-trigger assembly based on spider spinnerets can extrude and weave alchemical adhesives into temporary constructions. As an Interact action, you can attach a [tanglefoot bag](/Equipment.aspx?ID=78) to the extruder. A loaded tanglefoot extruder can be activated to consume the attached tanglefoot bag and convert it into a 30-foot [rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44), [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48), or [net](/Equipment.aspx?ID=681), depending on the nozzle die you choose when activating the device. The created object lasts for 1 hour. The DC to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) a created rope (if used to bind a creature) or net is equal to the consumed tanglefoot bag's DC and Escaping destroys the created object.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Tanglefoot Extruder
